content: {A挠头}That being said, before I even arrived, my moon crab managed to completely shatter the research Eco-Tank. So, yeah... things have gotten significantly trickier.

content: {A挠头}Errr, what I mean to say is... Thank you for allowing me to conduct my ecological observation efforts here.

content: Well, I guess it's not impossible.

content: If there's an application process, do I need to submit it in paper or digital form... {A挠头}Ah, apologies, I'm getting ahead of myself...
